Our Services

Helping You Resolve Building Violations

Since 2007, we offer complete building violation solutions, catered by registered, licensed, and insured professionals:

  • Remedy Corrected and Uncorrected Class 1 Hazardous Violations and Class 2 Non-Hazardous Violations
  • Obtaining Permits and Coordinating Contractors.
  • We Provide Mitigation of Penalties and Assesment of Filing Fees.
  • Representation at environmental quality control board (ECB).
  • Housing Violations and Housing Inspections.

Call (866) 545-4440 for your free consultation!

Correcting Building Violations

  • Illegal Interior Planning
  • Building Illegal Extension / Enlargement
  • Building Code Violations
  • Illegal Change in Building use (New C of O)
  • Provide Energy Analysis
  • Zoning Violations
  • Mechanical / Plumbing / Electrical Violations
  • Fire Alarm / Sprinkler Violations
  • Not Stable Foundation / Illegal Excavation
  • Structural Violations
  • Sidewalk Sheds / Pipe Scaffolding Violations
